languages.text: "Как прикажете. Мастер Херимон будет рад вести о скором... освобождении. Нынешний его господин весьма... неприятен. Я доложу, когда мастер Херимон будет доставлен на судно".
"As you please. Master Herimon will welcome the news of his forthcoming release. His present lord is quite... unpleasant. I will report back once Master Herimon has been brought on board."
languages.original_text: "Как прикажете. Мастер Херимон будет рад вести о скором... освобождении. Нынешний его господин весьма... неприятен. Я доложу, когда мастер Херимон будет доставлен на судно".

traits.locale_text: "As you please. Master Herimon will welcome the news of his forthcoming... release. His present lord is quite... unpleasant."
"As you please. Master Herimon will welcome the news of his forthcoming... release. His present lord is quite... unpleasant."

"As you please. Master Herimon will welcome the news of his forthcoming release. His present lord is quite... unpleasant. I will report back once Master Herimon has been brought on board."

languages.text: «Como desee. El maestro Herimon recibirá con alegría la noticia de su pronta liberación. Su señor actual es considerablemente... desagradable. Volveré cuando el maestro Herimon se halle a bordo».
languages.original_text: "As you please. Master Herimon will welcome the news of his forthcoming release. His present lord is quite... unpleasant. I will report back once Master Herimon has been brought on board."

traits.locale_text: «Como desee. El maestro Herimon recibirá con alegría la noticia de su pronta liberación. Su señor actual es considerablemente... desagradable. Volveré cuando el maestro Herimon se halle a bordo».

languages.text: 「仰せのままに。近々解放されると聞けば、マスター・ヘリモンも喜ぶことでしょう。彼の現在の主君は…とても不愉快な方なのです。マスター・ヘリモンが乗船しましたら、改めてご報告いたします」
languages.original_text: "As you please. Master Herimon will welcome the news of his forthcoming release. His present lord is quite... unpleasant. I will report back once Master Herimon has been brought on board."

traits.locale_text: 「仰せのままに。近々解放されると聞けば、マスター・ヘリモンも喜ぶことでしょう。彼の現在の主君は…とても不愉快な方なのです。マスター・ヘリモンが乗船しましたら、改めてご報告いたします」

languages.text: “如您所愿，赫瑞蒙大师一定会非常喜欢这个好消息，因为他目前的主人相当……怒气冲冲。等赫瑞蒙大师一上船，我就立刻向您汇报。”
languages.original_text: "As you please. Master Herimon will welcome the news of his forthcoming release. His present lord is quite... unpleasant. I will report back once Master Herimon has been brought on board."

traits.locale_text: “如您所愿，赫瑞蒙大师一定会非常喜欢这个好消息，因为他目前的主人相当……怒气冲冲。等赫瑞蒙大师一上船，我就立刻向您汇报。”

languages.text: "Wie Ihr wünscht. Meister Herimon wird über seine baldige Freilassung gewiss erfreut sein. Sein derzeitiger Lord ist recht ... unangenehm." Ich melde mich wieder, sobald Meister Herimon an Bord gebracht wurde."
languages.original_text: "As you please. Master Herimon will welcome the news of his forthcoming release. His present lord is quite... unpleasant. I will report back once Master Herimon has been brought on board."

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr wünscht. Meister Herimon wird über seine baldige Freilassung gewiss erfreut sein. Sein derzeitiger Lord ist recht ... unangenehm." Ich melde mich wieder, sobald Meister Herimon an Bord gebracht wurde."

languages.text: « Comme vous voudrez. Maître Hérimon sera ravi d'apprendre sa prochaine libération. Et pour cause, son seigneur actuel est pour le moins... antipathique. Je reviendrai vers vous à son arrivée à bord. »
languages.original_text: "As you please. Master Herimon will welcome the news of his forthcoming release. His present lord is quite... unpleasant. I will report back once Master Herimon has been brought on board."

traits.locale_text: « Comme vous voudrez. Maître Hérimon sera ravi d'apprendre sa prochaine libération. Et pour cause, son seigneur actuel est pour le moins... antipathique. Je reviendrai vers vous à son arrivée à bord."

languages.text: "Nasıl arzu ederseniz. Üstat Herimon, yakında serbest kalacağına dair haberleri memnuniyetle karşılayacaktır. Mevcut lordu, oldukça... Nahoş birisi. Üstat Herimon'u güverteye getirdiğimiz an size bildireceğim."
languages.original_text: "As you please. Master Herimon will welcome the news of his forthcoming release. His present lord is quite... unpleasant. I will report back once Master Herimon has been brought on board."
